segment.source: Choose how to deploy Internet Explorer 11 (IE11)
segment.target: Choose how to deploy Internet Explorer 11 (IE11)

segment.source: In this section, you can learn about how to deploy your custom version of Internet Explorer using Automatic Version Synchronization (AVS) or using your software distribution tools.
segment.target: In this section, you can learn about how to deploy your custom version of Internet Explorer using Automatic Version Synchronization (AVS) or using your software distribution tools.

segment.source: Deploy IE11 using Automatic Version Synchronization (AVS)
segment.target: Deploy IE11 using Automatic Version Synchronization (AVS)

segment.source: Guidance about how to deploy your custom browser packages using Automatic Version Synchronization (AVS).
segment.target: Guidance about how to deploy your custom browser packages using Automatic Version Synchronization (AVS).

segment.source: Deploy IE11 using software distribution tools
segment.target: Deploy IE11 using software distribution tools

segment.source: Guidance about how to deploy your custom browser packages using System Center 2012 R2, Windows Server Update Services (WSUS), Group Policy software installation, or Microsoft Deployment toolkit (MDT).
segment.target: Guidance about how to deploy your custom browser packages using System Center 2012 R2, Windows Server Update Services (WSUS), Group Policy software installation, or Microsoft Deployment toolkit (MDT).
